Package com.flemil.ui.component

This package contains the actual implementation of items that can be shown on a display.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
ButtonGroup A ButtonGroup represents a logical grouping of RadioButton Items such that no two RadioItem elements members of this group can be selected at the same time.
CheckBox Class that represents a CheckBox
ComboBox  
DateField  
Gauge Class that represents a Gauge that gives a graphical display of an entity as a ratio of a possible maximum
Grid  
ImageItem Class that represents an Item that can be used to display an image
Label Class that represents an Item that displays text to the user.
List Class that represents a list of Items that can be selected.
Menu Class that represents a push up menu that appears when a user presses a certain key.
MenuItem Class that represents a MenuItem that can be added to a menu and selectible from the menu.
Panel Class that represents a collections of items that are treated as a group within the display if the application.
PopUpWindow Class that represent s a Popup window that is displayed on top of a ScreenWindow.
RadioButton Class that represents a RadioButton
ScreenWindow Class that represent a Main application window that spans the whole display area available to the application
ScrollBar Class that represents an Item that can be used to show the extent of the current scroll and the remaining scroll distance for a Scrollable Item
TabsControl A class that represents a Tabs Control
TextField Class that represents an Item that displays text and allows input of text from the user.
 

Package com.flemil.ui.component Description

This package contains the actual implementation of items that can be shown on a display. These Items include things such as TextFields, RadioButtons, Panels, Windows and many more.
